titleStmt.title: A Letter from Scotland giving a true relation of the unhappy loss of the Gloucester-frigot, whereof Sir John Berry was commander : with a particular account of the persons of quality drowned therein, and the miraculous escape of His Royal Highness the Duke of York.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: torn, and with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library.
